title: Steampunk Tarot
description:
DESCRIPTION FROM

Where the past and future converge . . .

With a turn of the wheel and a spin of the cog, the oracular machinery lumbers into action. The curtains slowly draw back; the time has come to reveal your destiny.

Created by award-winning tarot expert Barbara Moore and brilliantly brought to life by artist Aly Fell, The Steampunk Tarot deck offers a glimpse of the future through a lens to the past. Retooling the gears of the Rider-Waite tradition, each cardÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s intricate artwork depicts a scintillating fusion of man and machine, nature and technology, science and alchemy, romance and fashion.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This torrent does NOT contain the companion book, as I could not find a place to download it, and retyping it or taking screenshots of every page would be extremely difficult and bulky. 

This torrent contains .png image files for all 78 cards, including major and minor arcana, and information files for use with Orphalese (or an equivalent software). These images are screenshots from the official Steampunk Tarot android app, which I highly recommend. The app contains all the cards and many spreads, as well as the entire companion book for just a few dollars.

I use the free version of Orphalese, which is not included in this torrent but can be downloaded from their site. I can't guarantee this will work with other programs since I haven't tested it, but the images and info files work with Orphalese just fine.
